name: Down with the (Space) Ship
description:
Your ship's reactor cooler has failed. Use the last moments of your life to fight off an alien invasion! Destroy as many turrets on the alien mothership as possible before time runs out!

W and S to move forwards and backwards

A and D to strafe left/right

Q and E to roll left/right

Shift and Ctrl to strafe up/down

Left Click to fire laser, move mouse to look around

Have fun!
